welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Elche, a charming city known for its stunning palm grove, rich history, and vibrant culture. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Elche has to offer during your visit!"

terminals.description: The main terminal at Alicante El Altet Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.
